text:
In infants up to one year of age, LCH may go away without treatment.",CancerGov,Langerhans Cell Histiocytosis
What are the stages of Langerhans Cell Histiocytosis ?,"Key Points
                    - There is no staging system for Langerhans cell histiocytosis (LCH).    - Treatment of LCH is based on where LCH cells are found in the body and how many body systems are affected.
                
                
                    There is no staging system for Langerhans cell histiocytosis
